holidays.title: Take Down Tobacco National Day of Action
holidays.description: A day of anti-smoking activism. Teachers, kids, youth leaders, and health advocates all participate!

holidays.title: April Fools' Day
holidays.description: Mischief-makers have the chance to trick unsuspecting people for that opportunity to yell “April Fools!”

holidays.title: Assyrian New Year
holidays.description: Get ready to witness one of the oldest religious festivals in the world.

holidays.title: Boomer Bonus Days
holidays.description: Here are ways you can honor the generation known as ‘Baby Boomers.’

holidays.title: Cyprus National Holiday
holidays.description: On Cyprus National Day, enjoy a day of relaxation while learning about the country's history.

holidays.title: Edible Book Day
holidays.description: Prepare your appetite, for today, we feast on books and their words.

holidays.title: Education and Sharing Day
holidays.description: Education goes beyond obtaining a degree to shape a certain career.

holidays.title: Every Day is Tag Day
holidays.description: Pets need a tag because they do sometimes become victims of circumstance or go missing.

holidays.title: Fossil Fools Day
holidays.description: Let’s move away from fooling others to doing something good for our environment.

holidays.title: International Firewalk Day
holidays.description: Firewalking can change your life and help you become a better version of yourself.

holidays.title: International Fun at Work Day
holidays.description: Bring out your best games and strategies to have fun with your colleagues!

holidays.title: International Pillow Fight Day
holidays.description: Consider yourself a pillow warrior? It is time to prepare your pillows for battle!

holidays.title: Library Snap Shot Day
holidays.description: The library remains a place to gather in the spirit of learning and having fun.

holidays.title: Lupus Alert Day
holidays.description: Lupus Alert Day raises awareness about the deadly autoimmune disease known as lupus.

holidays.title: Mathematics and Statistics Awareness Month
holidays.description: Let us honor the indispensable and diverse field of math and stats.

holidays.title: Myles Day
holidays.description: Prepare your best toast and immerse yourself in Irish literature on Myles Day.

holidays.title: National Connor Day
holidays.description: The name Connor is of Irish Gaelic origin, and it derives from the name ‘Conchobhar.’

holidays.title: National Fun Day
holidays.description: It’s time to get a little silly and have fun because it’s National Fun Day!

holidays.title: National Greeting Card Day
holidays.description: Grab your art supplies and witty puns, it’s National Greeting Card Day!

holidays.title: National Handmade Day
holidays.description: Put your clever hands to work as we celebrate this artsy day!

holidays.title: National Love Our Children Day
holidays.description: Show some love —  prepare to celebrate and lavish affection on children today and every day.

holidays.title: National Loyal Day
holidays.description: Loyal is a rare gender-neutral name that simply means loyal or faithful.

holidays.title: National One Cent Day
holidays.description: From riches to riches, learn all about the humble one cent.

holidays.title: National Sourdough Bread Day
holidays.description: Sourdough bread is full of bugs — some 50 million yeasts and five billion Lactobacilli bacteria.

holidays.title: National Trombone Players Day
holidays.description: Discover your inner trombone playing skills and enjoy a few spectacular musical performances.

holidays.title: Nickelodeon Anniversary Celebration Day
holidays.description: Explore the history of one of the world's largest children's networks and its famous animations.

holidays.title: Odisha Day
holidays.description: Honor the day Odisha gained its statehood from Britain this April 1.

holidays.title: Reading is Funny Day
holidays.description: Children need to understand that reading can both be entertaining and educative.

holidays.title: St. Stupid Day
holidays.description: If you want to improve, be content with being thought foolish and stupid.

holidays.title: Tatting Day
holidays.description: Tatting Day is an annual event that celebrates the traditional craft of lace tatting.

holidays.title: U.S. Air Force Academy Day
holidays.description: Join us as we delve into the exciting history of the U.S. Air Force.

holidays.title: U.S. Air Force Academy Day
holidays.description: Raise those right hands to the forehead and let's salute the immaculate officers from the Academy!

holidays.title: Jonny May’s Birthday
holidays.description: May is one of England's best players and he has a career of wins behind him.

holidays.title: Logan Paul’s Birthday
holidays.description: Paul has entertained the world since he was 10-years old — and he's not stopping.

holidays.title: Rachel Maddow’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rachel Maddow’s had an incredible T.V. and radio career — and it's only getting better.

holidays.title: Randy Orton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This professional wrestler’s legacy will remain timeless and relevant to future generations.

holidays.title: Sean Taylor’s Birthday
holidays.description: This N.F.L. icon still lives in the hearts and minds of many fans today.

holidays.title: Taina Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about the soon-to-be mother of two and stunning influencer Taina Williams.
